item.title: 【Introductions & Farewells】Hi from OnlyRadioEdits
item.description:
Hi all,

I enjoy many genres of music. Most of it is digital of course, but I also have a turntable with many 80s-90s records, and my car still has a working cassette player. If I had to choose a favorite genre, I enjoy 2000s - 2010s dance/club music the most.
Only problem is there's almost no nightclubs left in UK!

Why is that my username?
Music in the UK is very strictly edited. As weird as it sounds, I want my music radio edited properly. Sometimes, the officially released radio edit isn't good enough. I hate it when I buy a song, and it isn't the same as what it would sound like on the radio. That's where I will dedicate time making it so, even if it takes hours to do so.

Dan
item.author: OnlyRadioEdits
